content.query:
CREATE TABLE Policyfacttable (
    [month] INT,
    [year] INT,
    Number_of_customers FLOAT,
    sold_cars_policies FLOAT,
    inventory_car_policies FLOAT,
    liable_cars FLOAT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([month])
);

CREATE TABLE Salesfacttable (
    [year] INT,
    [month] INT,
    Avg_Selling_Price FLOAT,
    No_Of_Cars_Sold FLOAT,
    No_Of_Individual_Sales FLOAT,
    No_Of_Dealer_Sales FLOAT,
    inventory_count FLOAT,
    no_insurance_count FLOAT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH([year])
);
